DOC.brief_summary: To investigate efficacy , safety tolerability BI 1356 versus placebo
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety BI 1356 ( Linagliptin ) Versus Placebo Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Insufficient Glycemic Control
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female patient type 2 diabetes insufficient glycaemic control . Age 18 old 80 year Exclusion criterion : Use one oral antidiabetic agent within 10 week prior inform consent , insulin , glitazones GLP1 analogue within 3 month . Myocardial infarction , stroke transient ischaemic attack within 6 month prior inform consent .
